translations: <正式>（尤指不情愿地）放弃，交出（权力、职位等）；<正式>（不情愿地）松开

sentences.sentence: He does not intend to relinquish power.
He was forced to relinquish control of the company.
sentences.translation: 他被迫放弃对公司的控制权。

sentences.sentence: Eteocles refused to relinquish his throne.
sentences.translation: 厄忒俄克勒斯拒绝放弃王位。
